actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to allow any Federal employee to be granted leave without pay for purposes of attending a funeral of an immediate relative.

summary.text: Allows any Federal employee to be granted up to five days' leave without loss of pay to attend a funeral of an immediate relative.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to allow any Federal employee to be granted leave without pay for purposes of attending a funeral of an immediate relative.
